title: Upgrade Gradle version to 4.0

milestone.title: 5.0 M5
milestone.description: Themes: dynamic containers, test instance lifecycle management, and minor API changes.

body:
When using Gradle 4.0, a deprecation warning is displayed for the junit-platform-gradle-plugin.

Here's the full stack trace:

<details>


Here's Gradle's API reference documenting this deprecation and what can be done to workaround.
https://docs.gradle.org/4.0-milestone-2/release-notes.html#deprecated-apis
